name: Junior Design Engineer
description:
Our client - is one of the largest world leaders in its field, opens a recruitment for a position "Anaplan Data Analyst "

Responsibilities:

  • Developing Planning Applications in Anaplan for different business areas: Customer and Consumer, Corporate Finance, Supply, NRM.
  • Partnering with other Product Owners and BAs under E2E planning as well as other cross-functional capabilities.
  • Cross Platform Integrations (i.e. SAP, Reporting, etc)
  • Best leverage the capabilities of Anaplan as a platform while containing the growth of number of models and templates
  • Optimize technical costs for implementation of solutions via best fit cloud usage.
  • Understand and optimize the financial impact of existing technical solutions on the market recharge model
  • Delivery of the design including development, testing and release and update existing design documents as well as transition of Applications to BAU Support
  • Retain and continually expand Anaplan knowledge within company
  • Execution of Platform related agreed processes - individual for each lead designer – Integration, Anaplan vendor management, Platform Release Playbacks, Knowledge base, etc

Anaplan Training will be provided. Modelling in Anaplan resembles MS Access/Excel Modeling/Limited VBA programming using Anaplan native syntax (advertised as Excel on steroids).

Experience Required:

  • Technical Knowledge: Excel, SQL
  • Advantage: Anaplan Connect, SQL, Azure Logic App, MS Access, BI Tools, VBA
  • Functional Expertise as a plus:
    • Understanding of key areas of planning processes (customer and consumer, corporate finance and supply)
    • Understanding business demands and ability to apply it to Anaplan “use case”
    • Ability to execute the delivery of integrated Business-IT strategy and drive the execution

Conditions:

  • Fixed monthly salary + Yearly Bonus based on Company and Personal Performance
  • Official registration in accordance with the Labor Code of the Russian Federation.
  • Work for a large international company
  • Primary Technical Knowledge Anaplan training will be provided
  • Work schedule 5/2 from 9:00 to 18:00 (10:00 to 19:00), working remotely or from the office
  • Global travel may also be required (up to 35%)
